name: Christmas Cannon
description:
Welcome to Christmas Cannon! The Grinch has hired you to shoot down presents that Santa has tried to deliver to him.  Upgrade Your Snowballs to deal More Damage and purchase Turrets to destroy Presents for you.

Press U to use your Ultimate when its available

Have Fun!

Note: I made this game for a personal game jam. I was not able to finish in time so I'm uploading it now. I apologize if you find any bugs and that the UI is a little screwed up. Maybe I'll fix it but probably not. I have been struggling to stay motivated making games but doing this has restored my game making energy. 

REMEMBER TO POST YOUR HIGH SCORE IN THE COMMENTS

CREDITS
